title: Scope of Section
fullText:
This Section specifies general requirements for the following:
(a)	Location.
(b)	Mechanical and thermal protection.
(c)	Control.
(d)	Earthing arrangements.
(e)	Electrical installations and connection of generating sets.
Additional requirements, relevant to permanently connected generating sets and the use of a detachable connection for portable generating sets, are given in Sections 3 and 4 respectively.
